body_html: Forgot to mention: I'm using ndk 17 as I have a dependency that requires it (oboe, also from Google!), when running configure there was a warning saying bazel (0.18, just released) couldn't work with NDK 17 and it would lead to weird compile errors. It seems to me that can't be right though as I've found issues from 6 months ago where it seemed like building with NDK 17 should be alright?

body: Forgot to mention: I'm using ndk 17 as I have a dependency that requires it (oboe, also from Google!), when running configure there was a warning saying bazel (0.18, just released) couldn't work with NDK 17 and it would lead to weird compile errors. It seems to me that can't be right though as I've found issues from 6 months ago where it seemed like building with NDK 17 should be alright?
